deplete.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to reduce the amount of something that is present or available
deplete.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Salmon populations have been severely depleted.
deplete.translation[0].definitions[0].no: Deplete is often passive in this meaning
deplete.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to greatly reduce the amount of something, using up nearly all of it
deplete.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: Drastic measures will need to be taken if fish stocks in Europeâ€™s seas are not to be disastrously depleted.
